customer_name,

mapper.delete:
delete from business_income_budget where 1=2
or date = #{date}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT left(date,4) as month from business_income_budget where length(date)=6
select DISTINCT right(date,2) as month from business_income_budget where left(date,4)=#{year} order by month asc
select max(date) from business_income_budget where length(date)=6
